Enums/InputTypeMismatchAction.html.abstract: Action to take when actual input type at runtime does not match expected input type declared in code.

Structs/RequestError/Cause/UndecodableTe.abstract: The server’s response could not be decoded using the text encoding it specified.

Structs/RequestError/Cause/WrongInputTyp.abstract: A response transformer received entity content of a type it doesn’t know how to process. This error means

Structs/RequestError/Cause/TransformerRe.name: TransformerReturnedNil
Structs/RequestError/Cause/TransformerRe.abstract: A ResponseContentTransformer or a closure passed to Service.configureTransformer(...) returned nil.

Structs/RequestError.html#/s:6Siesta12Re.name: userMessage
Structs/RequestError.html#/s:6Siesta12Re.abstract: A description of this error suitable for showing to the user. Typically messages are brief and in plain language,

Structs/RequestError.html#/s:6Siesta12Re.abstract: The HTTP status code (e.g. 404) if this error came from an HTTP response.

Structs/RequestError.html#/s:6Siesta12Re.name: entity

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: onCompletion(_:)
Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.abstract: Call the closure once when the request finishes for any reason.

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: onSuccess(_:)

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: onNotModified(_:)

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: onFailure(_:)

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: start()

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.abstract: An estimate of the progress of the request, taking into account request transfer, response transfer, and latency.

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.abstract: Cancel the request if it is still in progress. Has no effect if a response has already been received.

Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.abstract: Send the same request again, returning a new Request instance for the new attempt.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: jsonDict
Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: Returns content if it is a dictionary with string keys; otherwise returns an empty dictionary.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: jsonArray

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV9t.name: timestamp
Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV9t.abstract: The time at which this data was last known to be valid.

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: timestamp

Classes/Resource.html.name: Resource
